Your sensitive data is now 100% unrecoverable, so you don’t have to worry at all about hackers seizing your data.

What is the pros and cons of shredding vs degausser
Pros: A degausser is good if you want to completely erase all audio, video and data signals from the magnetic storage.

Cons: Degaussing is not entirely fool-proof. It can only be used on magnetic media, and there is no way to guarantee that a particular degaussing machine is strong enough to destroy all the data on every hard drive.

questions.answer_description:
EAP by itself is only an authentication framework.
PEAP (Protected Extensible Authentication Protocol) fully encapsulates EAP and is designed to work within a TLS (Transport Layer Security) tunnel that may be encrypted but is authenticated. The primary motivation behind the creation of PEAP was to help correct the deficiencies discovered within EAP since that protocol assumes that the communications channel is protected. As a result, when EAP messages are able to be discovered in the ג€clearג€ they do not provide the protection that was assumed when the protocol was originally authored.
PEAP, EAP-TTLS, and EAP-TLS ג€protectג€ inner EAP authentication within SSL/TLS sessions.
